DEMO
/dev/ttyUSB0,9600,N,8,1,n
./
## This and the lines below are NOT read by the program
1 <NAME OF THE INSTRUMENT TO LABEL FILES>
2 <SERIAL PORT ADDRESS>,<BAUDRATE>,<PARITY>,<BYTESIZE>,<STOPBIT>,<EOL char>
3 <DATA SAVE PATH>

Examples:
grimm11E
COM4,9600,N,8,1,n
./

aethalometer
COM5,9600,N,8,1,n
./

ccn
COM5,9600,N,8,1,n
./
